name: Demi Moore Characters Quiz | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
The Butcher's Wife.

	This 1991 fantasy romance film stars Moore as a clairvoyant who changes the lives of everyone in a small New York community.  Jeff Daniels and Mary Steenburgen co-star.

If These Walls Could Talk.

	This 1996 made for television movie is about three different scenarios about abortion that take place in the same house over a 40 year time period.  Cher, Anne Heche and Sissy Spacek star in the other two segments of this movie.

Striptease.

	This 1996 film was a bomb at the box office.  It was about a woman who was trying to obtain custody of her daughter from her dead beat husband and must take a job as an exotic dancer to pay for a lawyer.  Burt Reynolds and Ving Rhames co-star.

The Juror.

	In this film from 1996 Moore stars as a juror who is threatened by the defendant, played by Alec Baldwin, to persuade the jury that he is innocent.

St. Elmo's Fire

	This cult hit from 1985 is about a group of college friends who try to make it in the real world after graduating from Georgetown.  Judd Nelson, Emilio Estevez and Rob Lowe co-star.

Indecent Proposal.

	In this 1993 romance drama, Demi stars alongside Woody Harrelson and Robert Redford.  She is plagued with the guilt of sleeping with Redford's character for $1,000,000.

The Seventh Sign.

	In this 1988 thriller, Moore stars as a pregnant woman who is forced to give up her life to save her child and everyone else from the end of the world.  Michael Biehn and Jurgen Prochnow also star.

Beavis and Butt-head Do America.

	Moore's voice is used uncredited as this character in Beavis and Butt-head's big screen flick on their big trip across America.

A Few Good Men.

	Demi stars in this riveting drama about a group of young military lawyers who set out to find the truth about a murder that occured at a marine military base.  Tom Cruise, Kevin Pollack, Jack Nicholson, Kevin Bacon and Kiefer Sutherland also star in this 1992 drama.

Nothing But Trouble.

	One of the few comedic roles tackled by Demi was in this 1991 flick as a woman and her new friend, played by Chevy Chase, who attempt a weekend getaway and end up with nothing but trouble.  Dan Aykroyd and John Candy also star in several dual roles in this comedy.
